dublin_core.dcvalue: This handbook is a comprehensive resource for getting started with mobile data collection It provides guidance on how to develop a mobile data collection strategy how to compare and select mobile platforms and case studies on how mobile technology has been used for data collection in development programs You can use the handbook as a reference or make it the foundation for a workshop to spread learning throughout a team Look for resources for continued learning throughout the handbook Why it helps with planning Relevant for programs considering mobile data collection Compares contrasts well known mobile data collection platforms Helps with strategy planning and implementation
